sentences.cn: ...涉嫌收取佣金和非法政党筹资。

sentences.en: But the process is widely regarded by multinationals as a fairly weird kickback.
sentences.cn: 但是这个流程,被跨国公司普遍认为是变相收取费用的方式.

sentences.en: For arranging the contract he got a kickback of $ 20,000.
sentences.cn: 为了促成这个合同,他得到了两万美元的回扣.

sentences.en: I will do it if you kickback a few hundred for my firm.
sentences.cn: 如果你给我公司几百元回扣我就干.

sentences.en: If the order can be accepted , we'll pay the kickback and commission to you.
sentences.cn: 如果这个订单能成的话, 我们可以给你回扣和佣金.

sentences.en: In certain situations, donating your medical services could be considered a kickback.
sentences.cn: 在一定情况下, 提供医疗服务应考虑到反扑.

sentences.en: Mike got a kickback from a merchant.
sentences.cn: 迈克从商人那里得到了回扣.

sentences.en: She was unable to take the medicine because of a marked kickback.
sentences.cn: 她不能吃这种药,因为后劲太大.

sentences.en: Starting saw blade against material to be cut or forward into kerf can result in kickback.
sentences.cn: 锯齿靠着被切割的材料启动或者启动中推入锯口会导致反冲(后坐).

sentences.en: The employment agency demanded a kickback on her wages.
sentences.cn: 职业介绍所要从她的薪资中抽取回扣.

sentences.en: The main form of commercial bribery is kickback.
sentences.cn: 回扣是商业贿赂的主要表现形式.

sentences.en: Those steaks were just a gift from the meat vendor. That was not kickback.
sentences.cn: 那些牛排只是肉贩子给我的礼物啊,不是什么回扣.

sentences.en: Tom got a lot of kickback in the awarding contract.
sentences.cn: 汤姆在承包大宗工程当中收取了大量的回扣.

words.tran_cn: 回扣，佣金；强烈反应；退回赃物

trans.tran_en: money that some­one pays secretly and dishonestly in return for someone’s help
